title: The proposed development shall be further subject to such conditions as may be decided by the Municipal Commissioner / Chairman, NIT, as the case may be
clause_text: The proposed development shall be further subject to such conditions as may be decided by the Municipal Commissioner / Chairman, NIT, as the case may be.
